Photo / Andrew Warner

NZ First candidate, former police officer file Reserve Bank complaint against Kiwibank after losing $500,000 in scam https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz-first-candidate-former-police-officer-file-reserve-bank-complaint-against-kiwibank-after-losing-500k-in-scam/4IBC4SKA4VGBJGVPFZL4H4SEAU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz-first-candidate-former-police-officer-file-reserve-bank-complaint-against-kiwibank-after-losing-500k-in-scam/4IBC4SKA4VGBJGVPFZL4H4SEAU/ Lane NicholsThe victims claim Kiwibank failed to monitor the account or carry out due diligence. Photo / Michael Craig
